content:
KUALA LUMPUR (Aug 30): Datasonic Group Bhd’s (KL:DSONIC) net profit for its first quarter ended June 30, 2024 (1QFY2025) climbed 41.96% to RM27.02 million from RM19.04 million a year earlier amid higher earnings from its operations.

Earnings per share rose to 0.97 sen from 0.67 sen.

The profit from its operations grew 35% year-on-year to RM36.88 million from RM27.37 million, mainly due to a decrease in operating costs.
